about_the_game: Not for the squeamish. Download DLC pack filled with blood, gore and splatter to literally flesh out the carnage dealt with steam punk weapons to the vermin horde. Observe the damage caused by your ingenious tactics and stratagem in all their gory detail thanks to this Free DLC for Shardpunk: Verminfall. Option to toggle on off in the game's menu will remain should you decide it's too much.

content_descriptors.notes: Shardpunk: Verminfall Blood Pack DLC may contain content not appropriate for all ages such as Fantasy Violence, Depiction of Alcohol & Drug Usage, Mature Topics, Blood.
